org.ff4j.property.store

Class InMemoryPropertyStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ff4j.property.store.AbstractPropertyStore
      • org.ff4j.property.store.InMemoryPropertyStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyStore

    public class InMemoryPropertyStore
extends AbstractPropertyStore
    Implementation of PropertyStore to keep properties in memory.
    Author:
    Cedrick Lunven (@clunven)
